title: v1.0.6: Enhanced AI Parenting Guidance
text:
We've enhanced our AI parenting guidance system with improved response accuracy and more personalized recommendations. Enjoy better support for your daily parenting challenges.

  • Enhanced AI response quality
  • Improved developmental milestone tracking
  • Better activity recommendations

title: v1.0.5: New Early Screening Tools
text:
Our latest update introduces comprehensive early screening tools to help identify potential developmental concerns early. Get professional recommendations for further evaluation when needed.

  • Age-appropriate screening questionnaires
  • Professional evaluation recommendations
  • Progress tracking for screening results

title: v1.0.4: Video Consultation Booking
text: Introducing video consultation booking with licensed child psychologists! Schedule personalized sessions to get expert advice tailored to your specific parenting situation.

title: v1.0.3: Mobile App Performance
text: We've optimized the mobile app to run faster and smoother. Experience improved load times and better performance on all devices.

title: v1.0.2: Multilingual Support
text:
MamaTogether now supports multiple languages including Persian and English. Get parenting support in the language you're most comfortable with.

  • Persian language interface
  • English language support
  • Bilingual content library

title: v1.0.1: Parent Community Features
text: Connect with other parents facing similar challenges through our moderated community. Share experiences, ask questions, and get support from fellow parents.
